00018 class sampleContainer:
00019     def __init__(self, fn,maxEvts,trainFrac,isBkg,dataMethod = False):
00020         print "Initializing Container!"
00021         self.tin = r.TChain("LDMX_Events");
00022         self.tin.Add(fn);
00023 
00024         self.maxEvts   = maxEvts;
00025         self.trainFrac = trainFrac;
00026         self.isBkg = isBkg;
00027         self.dataMethod = dataMethod;
00028 
00029         self.evHeader = r.ldmx.EventHeader();
00030         self.trigRes = r.TClonesArray('ldmx::TriggerResult');
00031         self.simParticles = r.TClonesArray('ldmx::SimParticle');
00032         self.ecalHits = r.TClonesArray('ldmx::EcalHit');
00033         self.hcalHits = r.TClonesArray('ldmx::HcalHit');
00034         self.ecalSimHits = r.TClonesArray('ldmx::SimCalorimeterHit');
00035         self.hcalSimHits = r.TClonesArray('ldmx::SimCalorimeterHit');
00036         self.ecalVetoRes = r.TClonesArray('ldmx::EcalVetoResult');
00037         self.trackRes    = r.TClonesArray('ldmx::FindableTrackResult');
00038         self.tin.SetBranchAddress("EventHeader",  r.AddressOf( self.evHeader ));
00039         self.tin.SetBranchAddress("Trigger_recon",  r.AddressOf( self.trigRes ));
00040         self.tin.SetBranchAddress("SimParticles_sim",  r.AddressOf( self.simParticles ));
00041         self.tin.SetBranchAddress("EcalSimHits_sim",  r.AddressOf( self.ecalSimHits ));
00042         self.tin.SetBranchAddress("HcalSimHits_sim",  r.AddressOf( self.hcalSimHits ));
00043         self.tin.SetBranchAddress("hcalDigis_recon",  r.AddressOf( self.hcalHits ));
00044         self.tin.SetBranchAddress("ecalDigis_recon",  r.AddressOf( self.ecalHits ));
00045         self.tin.SetBranchAddress("EcalVeto_recon",  r.AddressOf( self.ecalVetoRes ));
00046         self.tin.SetBranchAddress("FindableTracks_recon",  r.AddressOf( self.trackRes ));
00047     def root2PyEvents(self):
00048         self.events =  []
00049         for event in xrange(min(self.maxEvts,self.tin.GetEntries())):
00050             evt = []
00051             self.tin.GetEntry(event)
00052             #for entry in (self.ecalVetoRes[0].getEcalLayerEdepReadout())[0:33]:
00053             #    evt.append(entry)
00054 
00055             evt.append(self.ecalVetoRes[0].getNReadoutHits());
00056             evt.append(self.ecalVetoRes[0].getNLooseIsoHits());
00057             evt.append(self.ecalVetoRes[0].getNTightIsoHits());
00058             evt.append(self.ecalVetoRes[0].nLooseMipTracks());
00059             evt.append(self.ecalVetoRes[0].nMediumMipTracks());
00060             evt.append(self.ecalVetoRes[0].nTightMipTracks());
00061             evt.append(self.ecalVetoRes[0].getSummedDet());
00062             evt.append(self.ecalVetoRes[0].getSummedOuter());
00063             evt.append(self.ecalVetoRes[0].getBackSummedDep());
00064             evt.append(self.ecalVetoRes[0].getSummedLooseIso());
00065             evt.append(self.ecalVetoRes[0].getMaxLooseIsoDep());
00066             evt.append(self.ecalVetoRes[0].getSummedTightIso());
00067             evt.append(self.ecalVetoRes[0].getMaxTightIsoDep());
00068             evt.append(self.ecalVetoRes[0].getMaxCellDep());
00069             evt.append(self.ecalVetoRes[0].getShowerRMS());
00070             maxLen = 0;
00071             summedDep = 0;
00072             for track in self.ecalVetoRes[0].getLooseMipTracks():
00073                 if (track.first > maxLen):
00074                     maxLen = track.first;
00075                 summedDep += track.second;
00076 
00077             evt.append(maxLen);
00078             evt.append(summedDep);
00079 
00080             maxLen = 0;
00081             summedDep = 0;
00082             for track in self.ecalVetoRes[0].getMediumMipTracks():
00083                 if (track.first > maxLen):
00084                     maxLen = track.first;
00085                 summedDep += track.second;
00086 
00087             evt.append(maxLen);
00088             evt.append(summedDep);
00089 
00090 
00091             maxLen = 0;
00092             summedDep = 0;
00093             for track in self.ecalVetoRes[0].getTightMipTracks():
00094                 if (track.first > maxLen):
00095                     maxLen = track.first;
00096                 summedDep += track.second;
00097 
00098             evt.append(maxLen);
00099             evt.append(summedDep);
00100             if (self.isBkg and self.dataMethod):
00101                 pe = 0
00102                 for hit in self.hcalHits:
00103                     pe += hit.getPE();
00104                 evt.append(pe)
00105             self.events.append(evt)
00106             if (len(self.events)%1000 == 0 and len(self.events) > 0):
00107                 print 'The shape of events = (%s,%s) ' % (len(self.events),len(self.events[0]))
00108         self.events = np.array(self.events)
00109         print self.events.shape
00110         #if (self.isBkg):
00111         #    self.events = self.events[:,range(len(self.events[0])-1)][self.events[:,-1] > 8]
00112 
00113 
00114     def constructTrainAndTest(self):
00115         if (self.isBkg == False):
00116           np.random.shuffle(self.events)
00117         self.train_x = self.events[0:int(len(self.events)*self.trainFrac)]
00118         self.test_x  = self.events[int(len(self.events)*self.trainFrac):]
00119         if (self.isBkg and self.dataMethod):
00120           self.train_x = self.events[self.events[:,-1] > 8][:,range(len(self.events[0])-1)]
00121           self.test_x  = self.events[self.events[:,-1] < 8][:,range(len(self.events[0])-1)]
00122 
00123 
00124         self.train_y = np.zeros(len(self.train_x)) + (self.isBkg == False)
00125         self.test_y  = np.zeros(len(self.test_x)) + (self.isBkg == False)
00126 
00127 class mergedContainer:
00128     def __init__(self, sigContainer,bkgContainer):
00129         print 'Signal Training shape = (%s,%s)' % (sigContainer.train_x.shape)
00130         print 'Bkg Training shape = (%s,%s)' % (bkgContainer.train_x.shape)
00131         print 'Signal Testing shape = (%s,%s)' % (sigContainer.test_x.shape)
00132         print 'Bkg Testing shape = (%s,%s)' % (bkgContainer.test_x.shape)
00133         print 'Sig/Bkg Training target sum = (%s,%s)' % (np.sum(sigContainer.train_y),np.sum(bkgContainer.train_y))
00134         print 'Signal/Bkg Training wgts = (%s,%s)' % \
00135           (np.zeros(len(sigContainer.train_y)) + 1,np.zeros(len(bkgContainer.train_y)) + 1. * float(len(sigContainer.train_y))/float(len(bkgContainer.train_y)))
00136 
00137 
00138         self.train_x = np.vstack((sigContainer.train_x,bkgContainer.train_x))
00139         self.train_y = np.append(sigContainer.train_y,bkgContainer.train_y)
00140         self.train_x[np.isnan(self.train_x)] = 0.000
00141         self.train_y[np.isnan(self.train_y)] = 0.000
00142         self.test_x  = np.vstack((sigContainer.test_x,bkgContainer.test_x))
00143         self.test_y  = np.append(sigContainer.test_y,bkgContainer.test_y)
00144 
00145         self.dtrain = xgb.DMatrix(self.train_x,self.train_y,\
00146                                     weight = self.getEventWeights(sigContainer.train_y,bkgContainer.train_y))
00147         self.dtest  = xgb.DMatrix(self.test_x,self.test_y)
00148 
00149     #Class for re-weighting bkg to signal
00150     def getEventWeights(self,sig,bkg):
00151         sigWgt = np.zeros(len(sig)) + 1
00152         bkgWgt = np.zeros(len(bkg)) + 1. * float(len(sig))/float(len(bkg))
00153         return np.append(sigWgt,bkgWgt)
00154 
00155 if __name__ == "__main__":
00156     parser = OptionParser()
00157     parser.add_option('--bkg_file', dest='bkg_file', default='bkg.root', help='name of signal file')
00158     parser.add_option('--sig_file', dest='sig_file', default='signal.root', help='name of signal file')
00159     parser.add_option('--train_frac', dest='train_frac',  default=.75, help='Fraction of events to use for training')
00160     parser.add_option('--max_evt', dest='max_evt',type="int",  default=1000, help='Max Events to load')
00161     parser.add_option('--out_name', dest='out_name',  default='bdt', help='Output Pickle Name')
00162     parser.add_option('--swdir', dest='swdir',  default='ldmx-install', help='ldmx-sw build directory')
00163     parser.add_option("--data_train", dest='data_train', action="store_true",  default=False)
00164     (options, args) = parser.parse_args()
00165     print 'You set data_train_method = %s ' % (options.data_train)
00166 
00167     print 'Loading library file from %s' % (options.swdir+"/lib/libEvent.so")
00168     r.gSystem.Load(options.swdir+"/lib/libEvent.so")
00169     print 'Loading sig_file = %s' % (options.sig_file)
00170     sigContainer = sampleContainer(options.sig_file,options.max_evt,options.train_frac,False,options.data_train)
00171     sigContainer.root2PyEvents()
00172     sigContainer.constructTrainAndTest()
00173     print 'Loading bkg_file = %s' % (options.bkg_file)
00174     bkgContainer = sampleContainer(options.bkg_file,int(1.5*options.max_evt),options.train_frac,True,options.data_train)
00175     bkgContainer.root2PyEvents()
00176     bkgContainer.constructTrainAndTest()
00177 
00178     eventContainer = mergedContainer(sigContainer,bkgContainer)
00179     print eventContainer.train_x.shape
00180     #print eventContainer.train_x[eventContainer.train_x[:,0] == np.nan]
00181     #print eventContainer.train_x[eventContainer.train_x[:,0] == np.nan][0]
00182 
00183     params     = {"objective": "binary:logistic",
00184                "eta": 0.1,
00185                "max_depth": 6,
00186                "min_child_weight": 20,
00187                "silent": 1,
00188                "subsample": .9,
00189                "colsample_bytree": .85,
00190                "eval_metric": 'auc',
00191                "seed": 1,
00192                "nthread": 1,
00193                "verbosity": 1,
00194                "early_stopping_rounds" : 10}
00195     num_trees  = 1000
00196     evallist  = [(eventContainer.dtest,'eval'), (eventContainer.dtrain,'train')]
00197     gbm       = xgb.train(params, eventContainer.dtrain, num_trees,evallist)
00198 
00199     output = open(options.out_name +'.pkl', 'wb')
00200     pkl.dump(gbm, output)
00201 
00202     # calculate the fpr and tpr for all thresholds of the classification
00203     probs = gbm.predict(eventContainer.dtest)
00204     preds = probs
00205     fpr, tpr, threshold = metrics.roc_curve(eventContainer.test_y, preds)
00206     roc_auc = metrics.auc(fpr, tpr)
00207     print 'The auc = %s' % (roc_auc)
00208     np.savetxt(options.out_name +'_result.txt',np.c_[fpr,tpr,threshold])
00209 
00210     percentiles_vector_dict = {}
00211     percentile_cut_dict = {}
00212     for var in range(len(eventContainer.train_x[0])):
00213         tmp = []
00214         for percentile in np.linspace(10,100,20):
00215             tmp.append(np.percentile(eventContainer.train_x[:,var],percentile))
00216         percentiles_vector_dict[str(var)] = tmp
00217     while True:
00218         if (len(percentiles_vector_dict.keys()) == 0): break;
00219         cutVar,cutVal,cutSoverB = -1,-1,-1;
00220         for key in percentiles_vector_dict.keys():
00221             for percentile_cut in percentiles_vector_dict[key]:
00222                 S = np.sum(sigContainer.train_x[:,int(key)] < percentile_cut)
00223                 B = np.sum(bkgContainer.train_x[:,int(key)] < percentile_cut)
00224                 if S/sqrt(S+B) > cutSoverB:
00225                     cutSoverB = S/sqrt(S+B)
00226                     cutVar = key
00227                     cutVal = percentile_cut
00228         print len(percentiles_vector_dict.keys()),cutVar,cutVal,cutSoverB
00229         percentile_cut_dict[cutVar] = cutVal
00230         del percentiles_vector_dict[cutVar]
00231         print percentile_cut_dict
00232     percentile_cut_vector = [percentile_cut_dict[str(ele)] for ele in range(len(percentile_cut_dict.keys()))]
00233     print percentile_cut_vector
00234     for var,cut in enumerate(percentile_cut_vector):
00235         sigContainer.test_x[:,var] = sigContainer.test_x[:,var] > cut
00236         bkgContainer.test_x[:,var] = bkgContainer.test_x[:,var] > cut
00237     print sigContainer.test_x.shape
00238     print np.apply_along_axis(np.sum,axis=1,arr=sigContainer.test_x).shape
00239     passVetoSig  = [(ele == 0) for ele in np.apply_along_axis(np.sum,axis=1,arr=sigContainer.test_x)]
00240     passVetoBkg  = [(ele == 0) for ele in np.apply_along_axis(np.sum,axis=1,arr=bkgContainer.test_x)]
00241     print np.sum(passVetoSig),len(passVetoSig)
00242     print np.sum(passVetoBkg),len(passVetoBkg)
